alert.note: Alert for Daniels (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:49PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels and northern Valley Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 648 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Peerless, or 14 miles northwest of Scobey, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Port Of Scobey, Peerless and Four Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
